juzs.text: Ta shuo:`Zhuwei shizhe a! Nimen you she me chaishi ne?'
Tamen shuo:`Women que yi feng pai qu chengzhi yiqun fanzui de minzhong,
women jiang yin huimie tamen er jiangxia niantu biancheng de shitou,
na shi cong ni de zhu nali wei guofen zhe er fachu de.'
Wo ba cheng li suoyou de xinshi dou jiule chulai,
wo zai cheng li zhi faxian yijia guishun zhe.
Wo ceng zai cheng li liu xia yizhong jixiang, yibian weiju tongku de xingfa de renmen yong zuo jianjie.
Zai mu sa de gushi li yeyou yizhong jixiang. Dangshi, wo ceng paiqian ta daizhe yi jian mingzheng qu jian falao.
Dan falao yin you shili gu beiqi mu sa, ta shuo:`Zhe shi yige shushi, huo shi yige feng ren.'
Suoyi wo chengzhi ta he ta de jundui, er jiang tamen touru haizhong, ta shi shou zebei de.
Zai a de ren de gushi li, yeyouyizhong jixiang. Dangshi, wo ceng shi wuyi de baofeng qu huimie tamen,
fan jing na bao fengchuiguo de dongxi, wu yi bu biancheng posui de.
Zai sai mo de ren de gushi li, yeyou yizhong jixiang. Dangshi, youren dui tamen shuo:`Nimen zhanshi xiangshou ba!'
Tamen ceng weikang tamen zhu de mingling, gu ji lei huimiele tamen, tongshi, tamen yanjian xingfa jianglin,
tamen wei neng zhan qi, tamen ye wei neng ziwei.
Yiqian, wo huimiele nu ha de zongzu, tamen que shi beini de minzhong.
Tian, wo ceng yi quanli jianzao ta, wo que shi da neng de;
de, wo ceng puzhang ta. Meizai puzhang zhe!
Wo jiang mei zhong wu zaocheng pei'ou, yibian nimen juewu.
Ni shuo:`Nimen yingdang tao guizhenzhu, wo duiyu nimen que shi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe.
Nimen buyao yi bie de shenling yu zhenzhu tong shou chongbai, wo duiyu nimen que shi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe.'
Tamen yiqian de ge minzu ye xiang zheyang, mei you yige shizhe lailin tamen, tamen jiu shuo:`Ta shi yige shushi, huo shi yige feng ren.'
Nandao tamen ceng yi ci hua huxiang zhufu ma? Buran, tamen dou shi beini de minzhong.
Ni yingdang tuibi tamen, ni jue bushi shou zebei de.
Ni yingdang jiaohui zhongren, yinwei jiaohui duiyu xinshimen que shi youyi de.
Wo chuangzao jingling he renlei, zhi wei yao tamen chongbai wo.
Wo bu wang tamen de gongji, wo ye bu wang tamen de fengyang.
Zhenzhu que shi gongji wanwu de, que shi you quanli de, que shi jianding de.
Buyi de renmen, he tamen de pengyou yiyang, bidei yi fen xingfa, suoyi jiao tamen buyao cuicu wo.
Shang zai bu xindao de renmen! Dang tamen bei jinggao de rizi lailin de shihou.
Yi shanyue mengshi,
yi tian jing zhi shu
xie yu zhankai de pizhi zhe mengshi,
yi zhongren chaojin de tian fang mengshi,
yi bei sheng qi de cangqiong mengshi,
yi wangyang de dahai mengshi,
ni de zhu de xingfa, que shi yao shixian de,
shi renhe ren buneng dikang de.
Zai tianti zhendong,
shanyue shiqu zhi ri,
zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen,
ji yi wangyan xiaoqian de renmen!
Tamen jiang bei touru huo yu.
Zhe jiushi nimen shengqian suo fouren de huoxing.
Zhe shi moshu ne? Haishi nimen kan bujian ne?
Nimen jin huo yu qu ba! Nimen renshou qizhong de xingfa yu fou, sui nimen de fangbian, na duiyu nimen shi yiyang de. Nimen zhi shou ziji xingwei de baochou.
Jingwei de renmen, biding zai leyuan he enze zhong,
tamen yin zhu de shangci er kuaile, tamen de zhu shi tamen de mian yu liehuo de xingfa.
Nimen yin ziji de xingwei er yukuai di chihe ba!
Tamen kao zai fen lie chengxing de chuangshang, wo jiang yi baixi de, mei mudi nuzi zuo tamen de banlu.
Ziji xindao, zisun ye genzhe xindao zhe, wo jiang shi tamen de zisun yu tamen tongji, wo bu jianshao tamen de shangong yi sihao. Mei ren yingdui ziji de xingwei fuze.
Wo jiang yi tamen suo shihao de shuiguo he roushi gongji tamen,
tamen zai leyuan zhong hu di (jiu) bei, tamen bu yin'er chu e yan, ye bu yin'er fanzui e.
Tamen de tongpu lunliuzhe fushi tamen, naxie tongpu, hao xiang cang zai bang ke li de zhenzhu yiyang.
Yushi tamen dajia zouxiang qian lai huxiang tanlun.
Tamen jiang shuo:`Yiqian women wei ziji de jiashu que shi zhanzhanjingjing de,
dan zhenzhu yi shi en yu women, bing shi women de mian yu du feng de xingfa.
Yiqian women dique changchang qidao ta, ta que shi ren'ai de, que shi zhi ci de.'
Ni yingdang jiaohui zhongren, yinwei jie ni de zhu de endian, ni bushi yige zhanbu zhe, ye bushi yige feng ren.
Buran, tamen shuo:`Ta shi yige shiren, women dengdai ta zaofeng eyun.'
Ni shuo:`Nimen dengdai ba! Wo que shi yu nimen yitong dengdai de.'
Nandao tamen de lizhi mingling tamen shuo zhe ju hua ma? Buran, tamen shi fangdang de minzhong.
Nandao tamen shuo ta ceng niezao ta ma? Buran, qishi shi tamen bu gui xin.
Jiao tamen zuochu xiang zheyang de wenci lai, ruguo tamen shi shuo shihua de!
Shi tamen cong wu dao you bei chuangzao chulai ne? Haishi tamen ziji jiushi chuangzao zhe ne?
Nandao tamen ceng chuangzao tiandi ma? Buran, shi tamen bu quexin zhenzhu.
Shi ni de zhu de kucang gui tamen zhangguan ne? Haishi tamen shi naxie kucang de jiandu ne?
Nandao tamen you yi jia tianti, keyi deng shangqu qingting ma? Jiao tamen zhong de qingting zhe na yige mingzheng lai ba!
Nandao zhen zhu you nu'er, nimen you erzi ma?
Nandao ni xiang tamen suoqu baochou, gu tamen wei nashui er danfu tai zhong?
Nandao tamen neng zhi youxuan, gu neng jiang ta jilu xialai?
Nandao tamen yu yong jimou ma? Bu xindao zhe, jiang zi zhong qi ji.
Nandao chu zhenzhu wai, tamen hai you bie de shenling ma? Zhenzhu shi chao hu tamen suoyong yi pei ta de.
Ruguo tamen kanjian tian diao xialai yikuai, tamen jiang shuo:`Zhe shi cheng dui de yuncai.'
Ni ren sui tamen ba! Zhidao tamen zaoyu ziji bei zhen si de rizi.
Zai na ri, tamen de jimou, duiyu tamen hao wu biyi, tamen ye bu shou yuanzhu.
Buyi de renmen, zai na ri zhiqian, biding yao shou yizhong xingfa, dan tamen daban bu zhidao.
Ni yingdang renshou ni de zhu de panjue, yinwei ni que shi zai wo de juangu zhi xia de. Ni qilai de shihou, yingdang zansong ni de zhu;
zai yejian he zai xingsu moluo zhihou, ni yingdang zansong ta.
Yi moluo shi de xingsu mengshi,
nimen de pengyou, ji bu mi wu, you wei mixin,
ye wei sui siyu er yan.
Zhe zhishi tasuo shou de qishi,
jiaoshou ta de, shi na qiangjian de,
youli de, gu ta dadao quanmei.
Ta zai dongfang de zuigao chu,
ranhou ta jianjian jiejin er jiangdi,
ta xiangju liang zhanggong de changdu, huo geng jin yixie.
Ta ba tasuo ying qishi de qishi ta de pu ren,
ta de xin meiyou fouren ta suojian de.
Nandao nimen yao wei ta suojian de er yu ta zhenglun ma?
Ta que yi jian ta er ci xiajiang,
zai ji jing de suanzao shu pang,
nali you guisu de leyuan.
Dang suanzao shu meng shang yiceng dongxi de shihou,
yan wei xie shi, ye wei guofen;
ta que yi kanjian ta de zhu de yibufen zuida de jixiang.
Tamen gaosu wo ba! La te he ou sa,
yiji paihang di san, yeshi zui ci de mo na, zenme shi zhenzhu de nu'er ne?
Nandao nanhai gui nimen, nuhai que guizhenzhu ma?
Ran'er, zhe shi bu gongping de fenpei.
Zhexie ouxiang zhishi nimen he nimen de zuxian suoding de mingcheng, zhenzhu bing wei jiayi zhengshi, tamen zhishi ping caixiang he siyu. Zhengdao que yi cong tamen de zhu jianglin tamen.
Nandao ren xiwang shenme jiu you she me?
Houshi he jinshi, dou shi zhenzhu de.
Tianshang de xuduo tianshen, tamen de shuo qing, hao wu biyi, chufei zai zhenzhu xuke tamen wei ta suo yiyu he suo xiyue zhe shuo qing zhihou,
buxin houshi de renmen, dique yi nuxing de mingcheng chenghu tian shenmen.
Tamen duiyu na zhong chenghu, jue wu renhe zhishi, tamen zhi ping caixiang; er caixiang duiyu zhenli, que shi hao wu biyi de.
Ni yingdang bi kai na weibei wo de jiaohui, qie zhi yu xiang jinshi shenghuo zhe;
na shi tamen de zhishi chengdu. Ni de zhu, que shi quanzhi beili zhengdao zhe de, yeshi quanzhi zunxun zhengdao zhe de.
Tiandi wanwu, dou shi zhenzhu de. Ta chuangzao wanwu, yibian ta yi zuo'e zhe de xingwei er baochou tamen, bing yizhi shan de pin ji baochou xingshan zhe.

Yuanli dazui he choushi, dan fan xiao zui zhe, ni de zhu que shi kuanyou de. Dang ta cong dadi chuangzao nimen de shihou, dang nimen shi zai mu fu zhong de tai'er de shihou, ta shi quanzhi nimen de; suoyi nimen buyao zicheng qingbai, ta shi quanzhi jingwei zhe de.
Ni gaosu wo ba! Weibei zhengdao,
shaoshao shishe jiu qianlin de ren,
nandao ta zhidao youxuan, gu ren ziji de xingwei wei zhenli ma?
Nandao meiyou ren gaosuguo ta mu sa de jingdian,
he luxing jie ming de yi bo la xin de jingdian zhong suo jizai de shiqing ma?
Yige fu zui zhe, bu fu bieren de zui.
Ge ren zhide xiangshou ziji de laoji;
ta de laoji, jiang bei kanjian,
ranhou ta jiang shou zui wanquan de baochou.
Ni de zhu, shi zhongsheng de guisu.
Ta neng shi ren xiao, neng shi ren ku;
ta neng shi ren si, neng shi rensheng;
ta ceng chuangzao pei'ou ──nanxing de yu nuxing de ──
shi yi shechu de jingye;
ta yi zaizao wei ziji de zeren;
ta neng shi ren fuzu, neng shi ren manyi;
ta shi tianlangxing de zhu.
Ta huimiele gu shi de a de ren,
he sai mo de ren, er weicengyou suo yiliu;
yiqian, ta huimiele nu ha de zongzu. Tamen que shi geng buyi de, que shi geng fangdang de.
Ta shi na bei dianfu de chengshi fuwang,
gu fugai de dongxi ceng fugaile na chengshi.
Ni huaiyi ni de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zhe shi gu shi di naxie jinggao zhe zhi zhong de yige jinggao zhe.
Linjin de shijian, yijing linjinle;
chu zhenzhu wai, meiyou neng jieshi ta de.
Nandao nimen wei zhe xun ci er chayi ma?
Nimen zenme chaoxiao er bu tongku ne?
Nimen shi shuhu de.
Nimen yingdang wei zhen zhu er koutou, yingdang chongbai ta.
Fuhuo shi linjinle, yueliang poliele.
Ruguo tamen kanjian yizhong jixiang, tamen jiu tuibi, erqie shuo:`Zhe shi yizhong youli de moshu.'
Tamen fouren ta, erqie shuncong siyu. Mei yi jian shi dou shi queding de.
Baohan jingjie de xuduo xiaoxi, que yi lailin tamenle,
na shi ji jingmi de zhihui; dan jinggao shi wuxiao de,
gu ni yingdang bi kai tamen. Dang zhaohuan zhe zhao ren yu nanshi de rizi,
tamen bu gan yangshi de you fen zhong chulai, haoxiang shi biandi de huangchong;
Dajia yinjing er ben, qunji yu zhaohuan zhe de mianqian. Bu xindao de renmen jiang shuo:`Zhe shi yige fannan de rizi!'
Zai tamen zhiqian, nu ha de zongzu fourenguo, tamen fourenguo wo de pu ren, tamen shuo:`Zhe shi yige feng ren.'Ta ceng bei he chi,
gu ta qidao ta de zhu shuo:`Wo que shi bei yapo de, qiu ni xiangzhu ba!'
Wo jiu yi qingzhu de yushui kaile xuduo tianmen,
wo you shi dadishang de quanyuan yongchu; yushui he quanshui, jiu yi jiding de zhuangkuang er huihe.
Wo shi ta chengzuo yi zhi yong muban he dingzi zhizao de chuanshang,
zai wo de juangu zhi xia piaoliu, yi baoda bei ren fouren zhe.
Wo que yi jiang zhe jian shi liu zuo yizhong jixiang, you jieshou quangao zhe ma?
Wo de xingfa he jinggao shi zenyang de!
Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” yiyu jisong, you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
A de ren fourenguo xianzhi, wo de xingfa he jinggao shi zenyang de!
Wo que yi shi baofeng zai yige hen xiong'e de rizi qu huimie tamen,
baofeng jiang zhongren ba qi, tamen haoxiang bei ba chu di hai zao shugan yiyang.
Wo de xingfa he jinggao shi zenyang de!
Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” yiyu jisong, you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
Sai mo de ren fourenguo jinggao,
gu tamen shuo:`Women tongzu de yige fanren, women neng shuncong ta ma? Ruguo nayang, women biding xianyu mi wu he fengkuang zhi zhong.
Nandao tamen zai women zhi jian duzi feng dao qishi ma? Buran, ta shi shuohuang zhe, shi aoman zhe.'
Tamen mingri jiang zhidao shui shi shuohuang zhe, shui shi aoman zhe.
Wo biding shi mu tuo kaoyan tamen, gu ni yingdang qidai tamen, bing yingdang jianren,
ni yingdang gaosu tamen, jing shui shi tamen he mu tuo suo jun fen de, ying de shui fen de, lunliuzhe dao jing bian lai.
Tamen ceng han lai tamen de pengyou, ta jiu na qi jian lai zaile mu tuo.
Wo de xingfa he jinggao shi zenyang de!
Wo que yi shi yizhong baozha qu huimie tamen, tamen jiu biancheng zao quan lan zhe suoyong de kumu.
Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” yiyu jisong, you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
Lu te de zongzu ceng fouren jinggao,
wo que yi shi feishazoushi de baofeng qu huimie tamen; wei lu te de xintu, wo zai liming shi zhengjiule tamen.
Na shi cong wo de zhu nali fachu de endian, wo ruci baochou ganxie zhe.
Ta que yi jiang wo de chengzhi jinggao tamen, dan tamen yi huaiyi de taidu fouren jinggao.
Tamen que yi youhuo ta, jiao ta buyao baohu ta de keren, dan wo tumole tamen de yanjing. Nimen changshi wo de xingfa he jinggao ba!
Yizhong yongheng de xingfa zai zaochen que yi xijile tamen.
Nimen changshi wo de xingfa he jinggao ba!
Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” yiyu jisong, you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
Jinggao que yi jianglin falao de baixing,
tamen fourenle wo de yiqie jixiang, guwo yi wanneng zhe quanneng zhe de taidu, chengzhile tamen.
Nimen zhong bu xindao de renmen bi zhe deng ren hai youxiu ne? Haishi tian jing zhong you guanyu nimen de she tiao ne?
Nandao tamen shuo:`Women shi yige changsheng de tuanti.'
Nage tuanti jiang baibei, tamen jiang zhuan bei.
Buran, fuhuo shi shi tamen de yue qi; fuhuo shi shi geng jiannan de, shi geng xinku de.
Fanzui zhe dique zai mi wu he liehuo zhong.
Tamen pufuzhe bei tuo ru huo yu zhi ri, jiang dui tamen shuo:`Nimen changshi huo yu de shaozhuo ba!'
Wo que yi yi dingliang er chuangzao wanwu,
wo de mingling zhishi kuai ru zhuanshun de yiju hua.
Wo que yi jiang nimen de zongpai huimiele. You jieshou quangao de ren ma?
Fan tamen suo zuo de shi, dou jizai zai tian jing zhong.
Yiqie xiaoshi he dashi, dou shi bei jilu de.
Jingwei de renmen, biding zai leyuan li, zai guangming zhong,
zai quanneng de zhu nali, de ju yige ruyi di diwei.
Zhiren zhu,
ceng jiaoshou “gulanjing”,
ta chuangzaole ren,
bing jiao ren xiuci.
Ri yue shi yi ding shu er yunxing de.
Caomu shi shuncong ta de yizhi de.
Ta ceng jiang tian sheng qi. Ta ceng guiding gongping,
yimian nimen yong cheng bugong.
Nimen yingdang binggong di jin shou heng du, nimen buyao shi suo cheng zhi wu fenliang buzu.
Ta wei zhongsheng er jiang da di fangxia.
Da dishang you shuiguo, he you hua bi di hai zao,
yu you gan de wugu he xiangcao.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Ta ceng yong taoqi ban de gan tu chuangzao ren,
ta yong huoyan chuangzao jingling.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Ta shi liang ge dongfang de zhu, yeshi liang ge xifang de zhu.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Ta ceng ren liang hai xiangjiao er huihe,
liang hai zhi jian, you yige difang, liang hai hu bu qinfan.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Ta cong liang haizhong quchu da zhenzhu he xiao zhenzhu.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai haizhong wei fan gaoju, zhuang ru shanluan de chuanbo, zhishi ta de.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Fan zai dadishang de, dou yao huimie;
weiyou ni de zhu de benti, juyou zunyan yu da de, jiang yongheng cunzai.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Fan zai tiandi jian de dou yang qiu ta; ta shi shi dou you shiwu.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Jingling he renlei a! Wo jiang zhuanxin yingfu nimen.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Jingling he renlei de qunzhong a! Ruguo nimen neng tongguo tiandi de jingjie, nimen jiu tongguo ba! Nimen bixu pingju yizhong quanbing, caineng tongguo.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Huoyan he huo yan jiang bei jiang yu nimen, er nimen buneng ziwei.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Dangtian po li de shihou, tian jiang biancheng meigui se, haoxiang hong pi yiyang.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai na ri, renhe ren he jingling dou bu yin zuiguo er shou shenwen.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Fanzui zhe jiang yin tamen de xingji er bei renshi, tamen de e fa jiang bei xi zai jiaozhang shang.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zhe shi fanzui zhe suo fouren de huo yu.
Tamen jiang wanglai yu huo yu he feishui zhi jian.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Fan pa zhan zai zhu de yuqian shou shenwen zhe, dou de xiangshou liang zuo leyuan.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Na liang zuo leyuan, shi you gezhong guoshu de.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai na liang zuo leyuan li, you liang dong liuxing de quanyuan.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai na liang zuo leyuan li, mei zhong shuiguo, dou you liangyang.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Tamen kao zai yong jinduan zuo li zi de zuo ru shang, na liang zuo leyuan de shuiguo, dou shi shou suo neng ji de.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai naxie leyuan zhong, you bu shi feili de qizi; zai tamen de qi zi zhiqian, renhe ren he renhe jingling dou wei yu tamen jiaojieguo.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Tamen haoxiang hongbaoshi he xiao zhenzhu yiyang.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Xingshan zhe, zhi shou shan bao.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Ci yu na liang zuo leyuan de, hai you liang zuo leyuan.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Na liang zuo leyuan dou shi cangcui de.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai na liang zuo leyuan li, you liang dong yongchu de quanyuan.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai na liang zuo leyuan li, you shuiguo, you hai zao, you shiliu.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai naxie leyuan li, you xuduo xianshu jiali de nuzi.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Tamen shi baixi de, shi zheju yu zhangmu zhong de.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai tamen de qi zi zhiqian, renhe ren huo jingling, dou weiceng yu tamen jiaojieguo.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Tamen kao zai cuilu de zuo ru he meili de hua tan shang.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Duo fu zai, ni ju zunyan he da de de zhu de minghao!
Dang na jian dashi fasheng de shihou,
meiyou renhe ren fouren qi fasheng.
Na jian dashi jiang shi neng shi ren jiangji, neng shi ren shengji de;
dang da di zhendang,
shanluan fensui,
hua wei sanman de chen'ai,
er nimen fen wei san deng de shihou.
Xingfu zhe, xingfu zhe shi hedeng de ren?
Boming zhe, boming zhe shi hedeng de ren?
Zui xianxing shan zhe, shi zui xianru leyuan de ren.
Zhe deng ren, que shi meng zhu juangu de.
Tamen jiang zai enze de leyuan zhong.
Xuduo qian ren
he shaoshu hou ren,
zai zhubao xiang cheng de chuangta shang,
bici xiangdui di kao zai shangmian.
Changsheng bulao de tongpu, lunliuzhe fushi tamen,
pengzhe zhan he hu, yu man bei de liquan;
tamen bu yin na liquan er toutong, ye bu mingding.
Tamen you ziji suo xuanze de shuiguo,
he ziji suo aihao de niao rou.
Hai you bai zhe de, mei mudi qizi,
haoxiang cang zai bang ke li de zhenzhu yiyang.
Na shi weile baochou tamen de shanxing.
Tamen zai leyuan li, ting bu dao e yan he huanghua,
dan tingdao shuo:`Zhu nimen ping'an! Zhu nimen ping'an!'
Xingfu zhe, xingfu zhe shi hedeng de ren?
Tamen xiangshou wu ci de suanzao shu,
jieshi leilei de xiangjiao shu;
manman de shu yin;
fanfan de liushui;
fengfu de shuiguo,
si shi bu jue, keyi suiyi zhai shi;
yu bei sheng qi de chuangta.
Wo shi tamen chongxin shengzhang,
wo shi tamen chang wei chunu,
yilian zhangfu, bici tong sui;
zhexie dou shi xingfu zhe suo xiangshou de.
Tamen shi xuduo qian ren
he xuduo hou ren.
Boming zhe, boming zhe shi hedeng de ren?
Tamen zai du feng he feishui zhong,
zai hei yan de yinying xia,
ji bu liangshuang, you bu meiguan.
Yiqian tamen que shi haohua de,
que shi guzhi dazui de,
tamen chang shuo:`Nandao women sihou, yibiancheng chentu he kugu de shihou, women biding yao fuhuo ma?
Lian women de zuxian ye yao fuhuo ma?'
Ni shuo:`Qian ren he hou ren,
zai yige zhuming de riqi de teding shijian biding yao bei jihe.
Ranhou mi wu de, fouding fuhuo de renmen a!
Nimen biding shi cuan hu mu de guoshi,
er yi ta chongji,
ranhou tongyin feishui,
xiang hai xiao ke bing de luotuo yin liangshui yiyang.
Zhe shi tamen zai baoying zhi ri suo shou de kuandai.
Wo ceng chuangzao nimen, nimen zen buxin fuhuo ne?
Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo she de jingye,
jiujing shi nimen ba ta zaocheng ren ne? Haishi wo ba ta zaocheng ren ne?
Wo ceng jiang siwang fenpei ji nimen, renhe ren buneng zunao wo,
bu rang wo gaibian nimen de pin xing, er shi nimen shengzhang zai nimen suo buzhi de zhuangtai zhong.
Nimen que yi zhidao chuci de shengzhang, nimen zen bu juewu ne?
Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo gengzhong de zhuangjia,
jiujing shi nimen shi ta fa rong ne? Haishi wo shi ta fa rong ne?
Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi shi ta diaoling, er nimen biancheng chayi zhe,
nimen jiang shuo:`Women shi zao sunshi de.
Buran! Women shi bei boduo de.'
Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo yin de shui,
jiujing shi nimen shi ta cong yun zhong jiangxia de ne? Haishi wo shi ta jiangxia de ne?
Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo biding shi ta biancheng ku de, nimen zenme bu ganxie ne?
Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo zuan qu de huo,
jiujing shi nimen shi sui mu shengzhang de ne? Haishi wo shi ta shengzhang de ne?
Wo yi ta wei jiaoxun, bingqie yi ta wei huangye de jumin de weiji,
gu nimen yingdang songyang ni de zhu de daming.
Wo bi yi xingsu de moluo chu mengshi,
zhe que shi yige zhongda de mengshi, jiaruo nimen zhidao.
Zhe que shi baogui de “gulanjing”,
jilu zai zhencang de jingben zhong,
zhiyou chunjie zhe cai de fumo na jingben.
“Gulanjing” shi cong quan shijie de zhu jiang shi de.
Nandao nimen miaoshi zhe xun ci,
er yi fouren daiti ganxie ma?
(Nimen) zenme buzai linghun dao jiang sizhe de yanhou de shihou——
na shihou, nimen dajia kanzhe ta,
wo bi nimen geng linjin ta, dan nimen bu xiaode,
ruguo nimen bushi shou baoying de,——
nimen zen bu shi linghun fu fan yu benwei ne? Ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.
Ruguo ta shi bei juangu de,
namo, ta jiang xiangshou shushi, jiyang yu enze de leyuan;
ruguo ta shi xingfu zhe,
namo, yiban xingfu de ren jiang dui ta shuo:`Zhu ni ping'an!'
Ruguo ta shi mi wu de, fouren fuhuo zhe,
namo, ta jiang xiangshou feishui de kuandai,
he liehuo de shaozhuo.
Zhe que shi wu ke zhiyi de zhenli.
Gu ni yingdang songyang ni de zhu de daming.
Tiandi wanwu, dou zansong zhenzhu chaojue wanwu, ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de.
Tiandi de guo quan, gui tasuoyou; ta neng shi rensheng, neng shi ren si; ta duiyu wanshi, shi quanneng de.
Ta shi qian wu shi hou wu zhong de, shi ji xianzhu ji yin wei de, ta shi quanzhi wanwu de.

Ta shi zai liu rinei chuangzao tiandi, ranhou sheng shang baozuo de. Ta zhidao qianru di zhong de, he cong di zhong shengchu de, yu cong tiankong jiangxia de, he sheng shang tiankong de. Wulun nimen zai nali, ta shi yu nimen tong zai de; ta shi jian cha nimen de xingwei de.
Tiandi de guo quan, gui ta suoyou; wanshi zhi guiyu zhenzhu.
Ta shi heiye qinru baizhou, shi baizhou qinru heiye; ta shi quanzhi xinshi de.
Nimen yingdang xinyang zhenzhu he shizhe, nimen yingdang fen she ta suo wei nimen dai guan de caichan, nimen zhong xindao erqie shishe zhe, jiang shou zhongda de fu chou.
Nimen zenme bu xinyang zhenzhu ne? Shizhe haozhao nimen qu xinyang nimen de zhu, er nimen de zhu, que yi he nimen diyue, ruguo nimen yao xindao, jiu gankuai xin ba!
Ta jiang shi ta de pu ren xuduo mingzheng, yi bian ta shi nimen cong chongchong hei'an zou ru guangming. Zhenzhu duiyu nimen, que shi ren'ai de, que shi zhi ci de.

Nimen zenme bu wei zhenzhu er shishe ne? Tiandi de yichan, zhishi zhenzhu de. Nimen zhong zai shengli zhiqian shishe erqie canzhan zhe, yu zai shengli zhihou shishe erqie canzhan zhe, bushi pingdeng de, qianzhe bi houzhe pin ji geng gao. Zhenzhu yi zui you de baochou yingxu mei pai ren, zhenzhu shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de.
Shui yi shan zhai jie gei zhenzhu ne? Zhenzhu jiang jiabei changhuan ta, ta hai shou youhou de baochou.

Zai na ri, ni jiang kanjian nannu xinshimen, tamen de guanghui, zai tamen de qianmian he youbian benchi, youren jiang dui tamen shuo:`Nimen jinri de jiayin, shi xia lin zhu he de leyuan; nimen jiang yong ju qizhong, na que shi weida de chenggong.'

Zai na ri, wei xin de nannu, jiang dui xindao de nannu shuo:`Qing nimen denghou women, rang women jie nimen de yidian guanghui!'Youren jiangyao dui tamen shuo:`Nimen zhuan huiqu xunqiu guanghui ba!'Yushi, bici zhi jian, zhu qile yi du gebi lai, gebi shang youyidaomen, men nei you enhui, menwai you xingfa.

Tamen jiang hanjiao xindao de renmen shuo:`Nandao women yu nimen bushi tongdao ma?'Tamen shuo:`Buran, nimen zi qi, guanwang, huaiyi zhengdao, zhongzhong wangxiang, qipian nimen, zhidao zhenzhu de mingling lailin, hua zei ceng yi zhenzhu de yourong qipian nimen.
Gu jinri nimen yu buxindao zhe de fajin, dou bu bei jieshou, nimen de guisu shi huo yu, na duiyu nimen shi geng xiangyi de, na guisu zhen elie!'

Nandao xinshimen yiwei shijian hai wei dao, gu tamen de xin bu wei zhenzhu de jiaohui he tasuo jiang shi de zhenli er rouhe ma? Tamen bu keyi xiang yiqian ceng fengtian jing de renmen nayang, jingguo chang shiqi hou, tamen de xin jiu bian yingle, tamen zhong you xuduo ren shi fanzui de.
Nimen yingdang zhidao zhenzhu shi shi yi si de dadi fuhuo de, wo que yi wei nimen jieshile xuduo jixiang, yibian nimen mingli.
Shi cai di shi nu, he yi shan zhai jie gei zhenzhu di shi nu, ta biding jiabei changhuan tamen, tamen jiang shou youhou de baochou.

Xinyang zhenzhu he shizhe de renmen, zai zhu nali, shi qiancheng zhe, shi jianzheng zhe, tamen jiang you tamen de baochou he guangming. Bu xin zhengdao bingqie fouren wo de jixiang de renmen, shi huo yu de jumin.

Nimen yingdang zhidao: Jinshi shenghuo, zhishi youxi, yule, dianzhui, jinkua, yi caichan he zisun de fushu xiang zhengsheng; piru shiyu, shi tianmiao zizhang, nongfu jianle feichang gaoxing, sihou, tianmiao kugao, ni kan ta biancheng huangse de, ji'er lingluo. Zai houshi, you yanli de xingfa, yeyou cong zhenzhu fachu de she youhe xiyue; jinshi shenghuo, zhishi qipian ren de xiangshou.

Nimen yingdang zhengqu cong nimen de zhu fachu de she you, he yu tiandi yiyang guangkuo de leyuan——wei xinyang zhenzhu he zhong shizhe de renmen er zhunbei de leyuan——na shi zhenzhu de endian, ta jiang ta shangci tasuo yiyu zhe. Zhenzhu shi you hong en de.
Da dishang suoyou de zainan, he nimen ziji suo zao de huohuan, zai wo chuangzao naxie huohuan zhiqian, wu bu jilu zai tian jing zhong; zhe shi duiyu zhenzhu que shi rongyi de,
yimian nimen wei ziji suo sangshi de er beishang, wei tasuo shangci nimen de er kuangxi. Zhenzhu shi bu xi'ai yiqie aoman zhe, jinkua zhe de.
Tamen ziji linse, hai jiao bieren linse. Guibiyiwu de renmen, zhenzhu que shi wu qiu yu tamen de, que shi ke song de.

Wo que yi paiqian wo de zhong shizhe, qu chuanda wo de xuduo mingzheng, bing jiang shi tian jing he gongping, yibian zhongren jin shou gongdao. Wo ceng chuangzao gangtie, qizhong you yanli de xingfa, duiyu zhongren, you xuduo bi yi; yibian zhenzhu zhidao zai mimi zhong xiangzhu ta he ta de zhong shizhe de ren. Zhenzhu que shi zhi gang de, que shi wanneng de.
Wo que yi paiqian nu ha he yi bo la xin, wo yi yuyan he tian jing shangci tamen lia de houyi; tamen zhong you zunxun zhengdao de, tamen zhong you xuduo ren shi beini de.

Zai tamen zhihou, wo ceng jixu paiqian wo de zhong shizhe, wo you jixu paiqian mai er yan zhizi er sa, wo shangci ta “yin zhi lei”, wo shi ta de xintumen xinhuai ren'ai he ci min. Tamen zi chuangchujia zhi——wo weiceng yi chu jia wei tamen de dingzhi——tamen chuangshe ci zhi, yi qiu zhenzhu de xiyue; dan tamen weiceng qieshi de zunshou ta, guwo ba baochou shangci tamen zhong de xindao zhe. Tamen zhong you xuduo ren shi beini de.

Xinyang er sa de renmen a! Nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang xinyang ta de shizhe, ta jiu ba ta de enhui jiabei shangci nimen, ta jiu wei nimen chuangzao yi dao guangming; nimen jiang jie na dao guangming er xingzou, ta jiu she you nimen. Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.

Yibian ceng shou tian jing de renmen zhidao, tamen jianzhi buneng caozong zhenzhu de endian, bingqie zhidao, fan endian dou zai zhenzhu de zhangwo zhong, ta yao shangci shui, jiu shangci shui, zhenzhu shi you hong en de.
